name: Angler's Club: Ultimate Bass Fishing 3D
description:
Explore the lake and bring serenity and excitement of catching bass to your fingertips. Brilliant Nintendo 3DS graphics make competing in over 40+ tournaments an amazing experience. Customizable characters, lures and reels and gear will make you the ultimate bass fishing champion!

  • Precision control of the rod and reel with the Circle Pad and Accelerometer
  • 3D screen enhancements: Gorgeous water effects and real-time settings are enhanced with the Nintendo 3DS screen
  • Photograph yourself with the Nintendo 3DS Camera and create a unique Angler's Club Membership Card
  • Compete in 40+ exciting tournaments: Compare your ultimate bass weight and varieties. Place in the top three to earn trophies and gold!
  • Tons of Accessories: Master the art of fishing with 500+ lures, 13 rods, and 12 reels to prep for varying conditions
